price: Enyi mlio amini! Mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu na semeni maneno ya sawasawa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Iogopeni adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu mkimuasi, na semeni maneno yalio simama sawa yasio kwenda upogo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waqūlū qawlan sadīdan
